definition: to put sth on the market
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: A powerful launching campaign resulted in the large sales of the new type of air-conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 強有力投放市場活動使該款新空調的銷售額大增。

sentences.english: The taxi driver is going on about new fuel cells coming out shortly.
sentences.chinese: 出租車司機在和我聊不久將投放市場的新型燃料電池。

sentences.english: They are bringing out a new brand of soap powder next month.
sentences.chinese: 他們要在下月投放市場一種新牌洗衣粉。

sentences.english: Product "of the God card" and split the machine tool since the groove on the market since the widespread user acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 與刻槽工具自投放市場以來，深受廣大用戶的認可。

sentences.english: Thus, large CFB boilers can be designed and offered in the marketplace.
sentences.chinese: 因此，所設計的大型CFB鍋爐能投放市場了。

sentences.english: When Viagra was launched in 1998 it was the only drug of its kind.
sentences.chinese: 1998年偉哥投放市場的時候，同類藥物僅此一家。

sentences.english: The Touareg has received more than its fair share of recognition since its introduction.
sentences.chinese: 投放市場以來，途銳已經受到越來越多的認可。

sentences.english: Recently, a new generation of mirrorless cameras have hit the market.
sentences.chinese: 不過最近，新一代的無反光鏡相機已投放市場。

sentences.english: When will it be time to float the new firm on the open market?
sentences.chinese: 何時纔是將新公司投資債券投放市場的時機呢？

sentences.english: The Screenfridge is due to hit the market sometime in early 2005.
sentences.chinese: “屏幕冷極”將於2005年年初某個時候投放市場。

sentences.english: That's true. The quality of the products is the first priority when marketing them.
sentences.chinese: 確實如此，產品投放市場時質量是第一位的。

sentences.english: Nike is ready to launch new models of tennis shoes on the market in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 耐克公司準備於秋季將新款網球鞋投放市場。
